title: O’Neill delight as Celtic ease to Europa League playoff with win over Utrecht
desc: Martin O’Neill enjoyed his first home European game as Celtic manager for more than 20 years as his team cruised to a 4-2 win over Utrecht

title: Villa rampage into UEL round of 16 as Roma, Porto clinch top-8 spot
desc: Lyon and Aston Villa finished at the top of the Europa League standings, while Roma and Porto narrowly secured a place in the top eight to earn direct passage to the round of 16.

title: Ollie Peake century guides Australia U19s to World Cup semi-finals
desc: The calmness of Ollie Peake’s captaincy steadied Australia’s next generation when the pressure finally arrived.

title: Canada sending 207 athletes to Milano-Cortina Olympics, including 109 rookies
desc: More than 50 cent of Canada's Olympic athletes will be making their Games debut next month in Milan Cortina, the Canadian Olympic Committee announced Thursday.

title: Experts Identify Week-Long Grand Challenges
desc: Researchers identified key technical, design, user and ethical challenges surrounding computer control of the human body via technologies like on-body actuators and electrical muscle stimulation, urging a future focus on experience and ethics alongside technical advancement.

title: IAF drops 12,000 litres of water to battle forest fires in Arunachal Pradesh’s Lohit Valley
desc: IAF combats Lohit Valley forest fires by dropping 12,000 litres of water from Mi-17V5 helicopters at high altitude.

title: Woman charged with murder after death of one-year-old girl on Isle of Wight
desc: Jayla-Jean Mclaren died in hospital on 3 August, two days after she was taken there with serious injuries, police said.

title: Pakistan’s crackdown on dissent about much more than Imran Khan
desc: The former PM may be silenced but he's far from the only one under pressure as the military stifles dissent.

title: Danny Rohl answers Rangers transfer question on Findlay Curtis as he sets squad new 'challenge'
desc: The transfer window is now the focus for Rohl after the 3-1 defeat to Porto in the Europa League

title: Oscar-Nominated Doc 'Viva Verdi!' Joins Jolt Streaming Platform
desc: Oscar-nominated documentary 'Viva Verdi!,' about the retirement home founded by opera great Giuseppe Verdi, is joining the Jolt streaming platform.
